title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - the perfect indoor play and rest space for your beloved kittens and small cats! This 2-in-1 cat condo and cat sisal scratching post is designed to provide maximum comfort and entertainment for your furry friends.

Crafted with high-quality 600g skin friendly plush and a soft carpet base, this cat tree ensures a cozy and safe haven for your pets. The safe and stable base is specifically designed to prevent tipping and wobbling, giving you peace of mind knowing that your cat will be secure while having fun.

But that's not all - our cat house also features a unique leaves design, seamlessly integrating it into your home decor as a beautiful indoor plant. Your cats will love the playful hang ball and the sisal material scratching post, keeping them engaged and entertained for hours.

Assembly is a breeze with our easy three-step process, taking only 1 to 8 minutes to complete. Plus, we provide all the necessary tools to make it even more convenient for you.

At TSCOMON, we are committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Customer satisfaction is our greatest pursuit, and we are always available to address any concerns or inquiries you may have.

The dimensions of the cat tree are 11" x 15" x 41", making it suitable for kittens or one medium-sized cat. Choose from our color options of Grey, Beige, or Green to match your home decor seamlessly.

With a weight of just 6 pounds, this cat furniture is lightweight and easy to move around. The package includes 1x Cat Tree, 1x Assembly Instruction, and 1x Set of Tools for your convenience.

Please remember to check the size before buying and place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall for added stability. Lastly, ensure the safety of your children by not allowing them to play with the cat tree.

Give your furry friends the gift of comfort, fun, and style with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order yours today and watch your cats enjoy their new favorite spot in the house!
